content.detailedDescription:
I try to upload the video on my blackberry along with pics,with no luck. so today i went to the library to upload actual video.... 

no time to place camera on tripod so please excuse the shaking...
content.summary: Update for 33583 included video

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out my upstairs window, facing west, and saw what i thought was a very bright star in the distance. it was fairly low on the horizon and behind some trees. i looked at it and realized it was moving behind the trees at a very slow pace, slower than a plane, and descending slightly as it went. the brightness of it was really noticeable and steady in intensity. i used a 20x spotting scope but all i could see was a star-like image. the object was traveling from southeast to northwest and finally dropped below the treeline. i've seen the space station before, and this was a much larger and brighter object, moving appreciably slower. thanks you guys.
content.summary: Starlike object, brighter than other objects in sky. low on the horizon, moving slowly descending out of site.

content.detailedDescription: Case ���33633. descriptions sound similar to the sighting i witness and reported on 11-24-2011. i uploaded 3 stills for refrence, i currently have no access to internet so i'm unable to upload video, i used my blackberry to post this. please review my post report.
content.summary: Re: case: 33633 and the addison,il

content.detailedDescription:
A single bright orange light that appeared significantly brighter than a star.  approached from the sw and departed toward the north.  appeared to go out of view like a satellite.  too bright/to late at night to be a reflection off of a satellite due to sunlight reflection.

looked like the object had a bright center with an orange plume that was pointing toward 2 o clock when approaching from sw.  plume was oriented upward when directly overhead.  size of elliptical like plume was larger that the bright center but no larger than the nail on my pinky finger.

estimatation of the brightness would be initially equal or slightly brighter than the moon.  initially looked too bright for a meteor, too slow for a large meteor/fireball.  when it left toward the north, as bright as an aircraft with landing lights on.  with the very light scattered fog, appeared to illuminate a small portion of the sky at moments.

first impression was that it was an aircraft on fire as the brightness seemed to be varying while being continuously visible.  second impression was that it was an upper stage performing an orbital trajectory change.  

video shows light going toward the north after i pulled off the road.  color in the video appears to be off.
content.summary: Satellite/meteor with a bright orange light and slight direction change.

content.detailedDescription: My wife, 2 sons and i were exiting a retail store. we paused for a moment because it was raining very hard, i looked towards the sky to see the rain through the parking lot lights. i didn't hear any engine noise or helicopter sound. for some reason i decided to take these 2 photos of the rain and when i viewed the photos later i saw these 2 images that shouldn't be there. i do firmly believe in other life forms outside of our planet but they wouldn't be anything we could imagine. that being said i wasn't looking for a ufo in the sky that night. if there is another explanation of these lights besides a ufo please let me know because i didn't ask to photograph this.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It appeared to be square with a point near the rear of the craft, silent

content.detailedDescription:
I had just started a fire in the backyard and was drinking coffee and observing the sky directly above me. it was a pretty clear night with minimal cloud cover. my wife and 10 month old baby were also outside. while staring at the starts above me, i noticed a fast moving triangularly shaped object moving very fast from west to east in a straight line. the object appeared solid with 1 dim white light at each corner. had i not been observing the stars above me at the precise moment, i would not have noticed this object. if this object was not moving it would have appeared to blend in with the stars in its background. the object did not make any noise. there is a small airport near our house and we often get aircraft flying nearby. at the apparent altitude of this craft it should have been audible but was not. it was difficult to tell how big the object was because it moved so fast and was out of my view very quickly. i immediately pointed to the object when i noticed it and my wife glimpsed it as well. i have never seen an object move this fast, appearing to be low in altitude and not making any noise.

oddly enough, approx 10 minutes after this event, i noted a bright blue shooting star towards the south east that appeared to be falling downward instead of across the sky. it appeared to break into pieces as it fell, there was no audible sound. i initially thought it was a firework. i pointed it out to my wife but she could not turn quickly enough to see it (she was holding the baby).

initially we were trying to figure out what it could have been. was unnerving since we could not think of an explanation.
content.summary: Fast moving triangle shaped object, straight line path from west to east, dimly lit white lights at each corner

content.detailedDescription: On november 27, 2011 at 1:30 am  i was getting ready to retire for the evening and went to check the back sliding door to be sure it was locked. i noticed an extremely bright white light in the western sky. larger than all the other stars. we live in a flight path so at first i though it was an airplane. the "airplane" did not move (did not get any closer). the object appeared to be an oval shaped disk with what appeared to be a solid band of lights around it, with one light larger and brighter than the rest. i could make out the outline of the object and the underside appeared dark, almost black in the night sky. it would randomly blink red and greenish-blue lights. every so often i would see like short beams of light coming out at an angle from the underside. like a child would draw lines around a sun to depict rays. i made two other people observe this object. i stayed up for 1 1/2 hours observing these lights (and disk shaped object) that never moved from its position and finally went to bed at 2:40 am. it was a perfectly clear night. my reaction was at first it must be an airplane, when it never moved and i went outside to get a better look and realized the shape of it i thought, this has to be a ufo. i started looking online to see if any other reports were posted anywhere. did find one in ohio. i tried to get a picture and a video of it on my cell phone but that did not work. a planet is not oval shaped and does not pulse colored lights. helicopters make noise. i kept going outside to try to get a better look and memorize what i was seeing. it scared me and excited me at the same time and i am very frustrated that so far no one else saw this. i would like to know what i was seeing.
content.summary: Observed a circular, oval shaped from my position object with a solid band of white lights around it. one white light was brighter than all the rest. it would randomly blink red & greenish-blue lights around the sides of it. the underside was dark.

content.detailedDescription:
I was with a friend on the passenger side heading toward a fair. i have been studying ufo's for 6 years now and always watching when i'm out. so i am very knowledgeable about ufo's, uso's.I am also a photographer/artist where i look at detail. 

we were going about 60 on a spur to 295. it was a cloudy day. i see all sizes of planes daily. i know my planes. with the radio on, talking and windows up, i couldn't hear nothing unusual.  the airport is just behind it about half mile from where i saw it. it just left where the direction it was facing. 
looking out in front of the windshield i looked at a charter plane facing us.
i looked to my surprise a perfect white round ball was next to it. the scale of it was about the size of a car tire. 
i stared at because i noticed and a large luminous light that circled it completely. there was no color because it was during the day. we were driving so i didn't see it very long. i didn't get any kind of feelings when i saw it. it didn't surprise me. 
it was a little cool that morning too.
content.summary: Orb flying next to a charter plane

content.detailedDescription: After returning from a night of racing at desoto speedway we pulled in to our driveway just after 11:30am est. me my son and our crew chef noticed that the stars are very bright and my son and i stated that we have seen satalites on a night like this, our crew chef had never seen one so for about 30 min. we all started looking for some, but only saw falling stars and getting cold from the night air. as we decided to go in, over the horizon at about 45 deg we saw a rectagled object fly south, it had soft fant lights only at the points with a soft yellow straght lines connecting the corners. it was moving at 10-15 mph and made no noise, there was no rotation just straght flight it continued south until it disapered. we were left with only question. this is no aircraft. this is not man made. and it looked like it was able to cloke itself.
content.summary: Triangle in shape, soft rose colors at the tree points, straght lines connecting the corners, moving 10-15 mph no noise.

content.detailedDescription:
1. eating dinner outside with family.
2. father in law facing north.
3. space shuttle in low orbit
4. rectangular, transluscent, dull faced
moved extremely fast northeast to southwest while creating no noise. traveled on a straight path until out of view. entire sighting took less than 40 seconds. 
5. we were all baffled at what it could possibly be. weve never seen anything move move that fast while creating not one sound. 
6. lost sight when object went out of view over trees in neighbors yard.
content.summary: Very fast moving, translucent, rectangular object flying northeast to southwest with no sound production. no lights apparent.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a picture of an orange glow in the cloud is what i noticed first so i started taking pictures of it, i took four frames of it with my nikon d5100 with a 55-300 mm lens,it was a clear day with few clouds in the sky,the orange was about at about 2:00 in the sky, i was on a bus so it started moving, i never notcied the six lights in the left corner until i started to download them on my computer,the lights are not in the first two shots but appear in the last two, i don't know where they came from or where they went to after i shot them, i was shocked to see them and am frazzled as to what they are,i have posted it on facebook and flickr hopeing someone else may have seen the same thing and can identify what they are, can you give me an explanation, please,
content.summary: I was taking a picture of an orange glow in the cloud,

content.detailedDescription: Me and my parents came to the stop sign on ridge road on the outskirts of winston-salem. i was in the back seat watching ancient aliens on my iphone when both of my parents got my attention. they pointed out a boomerang shaped object with four bright white lights decending in a sharp acute angle. it had to be decending in an angle between 15 to 20 degrees. the object decended in such a manner that seems impossible for a plane to do. this all occurred in about 30sec around 8:30pm. when we first way it we believed it to be an airplane but we noticed it did not have any navigational lights and it was decending in a very steep, almost verticle angle. we were dumbfounded. it is hard to explain the emotions i felt as i watched the object. it happened so fast yet time felt like it was going in slow motion. we lost sight of the object as it decended behind the tree line.
content.summary: Object decended in such an acute angle that it could not have been a descending airplane.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the stars above the house. i looked through the screen of my canon sx30is and saw something, supposedly on the lens.  i looked at the area of the sky on which it appeared to be superimposed  and there was nothing on the sky so  i cleaned the lens of the camera  with a cloth and it did not go away. then i looked again at the sky. to my surprise, there was nothing there, but the think appeared on the screen.  thinking that this was strange, i took 3 pictures, automatically (bracketed for aperture). this is one of the pictures, the three of them are separated automatically by a few seconds and the object appears stationary. i looked again at the sky after i took the pictures and the sky continued to look clean. i continued taking photos of  other parts of the sky above the roof of the house (as in the pictures) and "the thing" did not appear in any other picture during the night. there is no light pole on that area of the house (front) that could be seen from that angle of view.  there are airplanes passing by and i have taken pictures of airplanes  in "bulb" mode and i know how they look inn this kind of photography.   i plan to take more pictures of the same spot during this week for comparison purposes. the three photos contain exif data that can be examined with proper software.
content.summary: It is a translucent object seen through camera, not visible by bare eyes.

content.detailedDescription:
Report filled out by state director - gregory andersen from information taken down by state director andersen and asd jim king

witness took her dog out just after 10:00pm(10:05 ��� 10:15) and observed out of the corner of her eye, movement to the west.  she then looked and saw 4-5 fuzzy outlined objects that seemed to be orbiting each or pulsating in and out in reference to one another.  these seemed to her to be moving in their orbit faster that any airplanes.  they were just enough different than the background sky to be seen.  she described them as being like a round cotton candy.  they did not emit any light and were spherical in shape.  each object was the size of her fist at arm���s length and they orbited each other in an area of the sky she described as appearing like 10 - 1 on a clock face.  she stayed outside for 20 minutes and observed the object until they seemed to dim as if they were moving away from her to the west.  her initial thought was that these were government craft.

she was asked if the objects were searchlights and indicated that they were not and that there was nothing to her west that would have searchlights.
content.summary: Spherical fuzzy outlined objects orbiting each other

content.detailedDescription: I had just finished dinner and was leaving my parent's house to go into town around 6:30 p.M. when a giant craft caught the corner of my eye to the east. it was so bright and large that i thought an airplane had caught fire and was going to crash. it took a split second for me to realize i was looking at something i could not identify. it was probably several hundred feet wide and had vents which released an intense amber colored glow. it was long and thin, almost cigar shaped (however i do not believe this to be the true shape of the object). my parents stepped outside just as it "collapsed" upon itself. to my suprise it reappeared in a few seconds slightly north but at least a mile away. its amber glow was still clearly visible. the craft disappeared and reappeared at least once more, even further away. my parents claim two fighter jets flew over the area soon following the sighting. while i heard them, i did not see them. the amber lighted craft has been seen in this area on and off for over a year now.
content.summary: Large elongated craft with glowing

content.detailedDescription: This way this evening nov 26th, 2011 , sighting began at 5:44 pm  made note of the time when my son's mother brought the light to my attention. after leaving a movie theatre in cherry hill nj and traveling down haddonfield rd in a southern direction, my son's mom pointed out a very bright white strobing light in the sky , fairly low and fairly fast.  at this hour there was plenty of other air traffic in the area with philly intl just a short distance from where we live in cherry hill.  it appeared to head in our direction from the south headed north.  it was very bright. based on the possible speed and height it seemed that it could be a helo or small plane.  position in the skyand rough distance would have put it just above haddonfield, a short distance from where we were.  the strobing white light fast and suddenly banked east then hard west again (towards philly / philly intl), and again fairly low in the skybased on buildings and other air traffic.  after banking west, the bright white strobe went out and 2 red strobing lights came on in a position rear of where the bright white light was.  the red lights were smaller and not as bright and strobed simultaneously side by side.  we were thrying to track it after turning onto marlton pike, rte 70, headed west with the lights off to our left , or south of our position.  road traffic was heavy so  we thought it safer to pull off to try and view and headed toward park dr. along the cooper river where we last spotted the red strobing lights head wsw.  after pulling off and getting out of the car, the lights were out of sight at that point, but tons of other air traffic that looked nothing like what we had just witnessed.  the speed was not inexplicably fast or erratic, but definitely faster than any other air traffic that was up there.  the entire sighting lasted roughly 4 mins. this is our first reported sighting in this area.  we have 2 others from 2008 when we lived in chestnut hill, a philly suburb.
content.summary: Bright strobing lights change color and pattern as well changing in flight path

content.detailedDescription: This happen to fast,but we're always ufo watchers. there were at least 12 witnesses. this saucer shape object was facinating! we had binocular and we all had a chance to see it. it hovered by the rio grande till it finally cross toawards the west , which is mexico.
content.summary: Saucer shape

content.detailedDescription: My husband noticed the box like object in the sky after 1 pm. on sat., nov. 26, 2011 in west duncanville, texas.  it appeared to hang in the sky but then after  he watched it for several minutes, it moved north a small amount.  he thought it might be a banner towed by a small plane, but he could not see a plane.  an unusually large jet liner passed by soon after also going north from south. it was a remarkably large airplane.  it had a normal looking tail and wing assembly, but the body of the plane looked to be twice as long as normal.  my husband is a private investigator and security manager and is used to collecting information and making observations.  he came home after seeing this object and told me about it.  we got in the car and looked for it, but did not see it.
content.summary: I t looked like a grey box or rectangle moving north from south. perhaps near the grand prairie municipal airport.

content.detailedDescription: We were traveling on rt. 93 northbound and around 10pm we were passing exit 1 (rockinham mall). ahead of us my wife and i spotted a reddish/orangish light. we both watched it as we got closer, and she said to me "do you see that?". i rolled down my window and stuck my head out. it was a single light, about 200 feet above the ground, hovering. i tried to see if a structure obscured stars as we passed, but i didn't spot that, suggesting that the object was no bigger than the light itself. my wife said it could have been a floating lantern.
content.summary: Reddish/orangish light, about 1ft in diameter hovering about 200 feet over rockingham mall

content.detailedDescription: 9 pm. waterbury, ct.  we were in the upstairs of our house when we saw a red-orange fireball through the window moving slowly across the sky.  we went outside to observe. it hovered for about 30 seconds, then continued, traveling southeast.  it appeared to turn.  it returned about 4 or 5 minutes later, traveling back over our street, then turning to disappear over the tree line as before.  it was silent.  we thought perhaps it was space junk burning up as it entered the atmosphere, but when it came back, we realized that it could not have been that.  it was mesmerizing because it was so unusual.  we called the police, they came and took the report, but were obviously unable follow up in any way.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Red-orange fireball in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Had gone outside at approx 7:30 pm to fill my outdoor wood furnace for the night.
when i leave the house am facing east.
i immediately saw several orange lights at various heights above the horizon moving in my direction.
they were separated from each other and as i watched more would move into view.
i took them to be a group of helicopters but never heard a sound.
rather then continuing on over head they eventually moved to the north and soon after that the lights were not visible.
this happened well short of the horizon.
guessing in all there was around 8-10 of these over the course of 5-10 minutes.
at the closest the best way i can describe it would be like a road flare seen off in the distant with more of a floating action then a direct flight like an airplane would have.
i didn`t notice any planes in the night sky until after i lost sight of the last one but likely there was.
one was flying over at that point from the southwest to the northeast.
content.summary: Several orange lights coming over the horizon and then turning or vanishing

content.detailedDescription:
I work twice a week doing night audit at a small boutique hotel in west hollywood, ca. i was at the front desk when my valet driver called me on the radio to come out side at around 1:15am.

 i walked out to the front of the hotel. the valet pointed to the sky and said what is that? it was a pretty clear night for la and at first i thought he was just showing me stars or passing bye planes or a satilite. 

but i looked closer and i saw about 8-10  single slow moving lights/objects moving at a steady pace through the sky. the lights where white  almost florecent and blinking in a pattern. right away  it reminded me of a bunch of synchronized swimmers moving in all different kinds of directions. at first i thought the lights might of been a outline to something larger but the longer i watched them the more they moved in all different directions. it looked choreographed. i have never seen any sightings before in my life and i do believe in ufo's but am sometimes skeptical. i see airplanes and helicopters all the time especially in los angeles, this was nothing like i have seen before, it was very weird. i went back in to get my camera phone but i got side tracked with a guest and bye the time i went back outside they had passed. 

a guest had also commented on it while he was waiting for his car and actually first noticed the objects
content.summary: 8-10 blinking pattern lights moving in correlation with each other slowly

content.detailedDescription:
Vantage point and sighting direction
standing at gps coordinates (per google maps) (gps coord moved to fi box) cms 11/27/11 09:35 cst flg, if you face north and then turn eastward approximately 65 degrees, that is the direction we were facing. if you view this direction with google maps street view, you see the power lines going above the apartments, garages and alley ��� the object we saw was hovering above the highest power line.
description
a little before 10pm, my daughter and granddaughter had exited out my building���s back door. they called my phone from the alley to come out and look. i saw what appeared to be a burning object and thought maybe it was an aircraft or a meteor, but it did not appear to be moving and there was no contrail. then we saw a big burning piece fall straight down from the main object. this piece was smaller than the main object, left a trail of sparks and embers, and seemed to burn out and disappear before it traveled a quarter of the way from the object toward earth. this happened two or three more times, additional chunks falling in similar fashion from the main object while the main object continued to hover and burn brightly - i say ���burn��� because it seemed to change shape and flare the way a fire does, and it was bright reddish orange and yellow like flames.
duration
this went on for 2-5 minutes (it is difficult to estimate the time since we were so stunned by this ��� it was unlike anything we���d ever seen before), and then the main object���s ���flame��� seemed to suddenly go out, although we could still see the object, now looking like a very dim star.
the dim spot remained stationery for another 30 seconds to a minute, then started very slowly moving downward. as it got below (from our vantage point) the highest power line, it appeared to start moving south as it also gradually sank lower ��� the southward motion seemed faster than the downward motion and we lost sight of it after 2-5 minutes when the building across the alley (east) from us blocked our view.
content.summary: Burning object hovered while pieces fell with trails of sparks, burning out. main object became dark like a small dim star, then moved slowly away.

content.detailedDescription: My wife was letting our dog out and noticed a strang anomaly in the sky.  she called for me to come quickly to see.  i got outside in plenty of time to see the oddly orange/red lit completely noiseless object in the sky.  i used a pair of low powered binoculars to see what appeared to have been something in a reverse teardrop shape lit with a noticebly orange light.  object was low enough to be a helicopter but moving too fast to be one.  my wife and i had no idea what it was.  she was glad i actually saw it with her.  she couldn't believe what she was seeing.
content.summary: Silent orange/red lighted object

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were traveling down 1-95 from gaithersburg to bwi airport. about a mile from bwi, neat elkridge exit we noticed a bright green light on the right. the object began heading towards us and literally slowed down and passed right above our car. i got a pretty good view of it through the sunroof. it was nothing i had ever seen before. it had no wings...At frist we thought it was a helicopter until we saw it above the car. it was pretty low was quite large and had two extremely bright, large lights coming from the bottom of the object. one light was bright green and one light was white. the lights never dimmed...They just had a steady glow (almost like a search light but they did not move). we could not hear any noise coming from the object and the best way i can describe the shape is like a blimp but much larger. it was flying in a strange path, changed directions a few times and our last sighting of it was when it gaines speed very quickly and we no longer saw it. we were both in shock and have been looking for answers on the interent all night.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.shape: Blimp,   Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Cylinder,   Oval,   Sphere
content.summary: Blimp like object with two large bright circle lights. one green one white.

content.detailedDescription:
In 1989 at spring mountain youth camp located at mount charleston , las vegas , nevada.
i was involved in a vehicle accident where the assistant basketball coach "joe sadovich" who still works there today was driving a beige chevy suburban.  i was in the front passenger seat, "joe sadovich" was driving on the camps main road "ries road" now named "lucky strike"
at that time it was partial dirt road. we came around one of the last curves to the left and a being stepped out of the forest and into the road and "joe" didnt see the being and struck the being at the last minute and dragged the being half way down the road and the suburban ripped off the left foot of this being which i will describe later then the suburban went over the side of the mountain. luckily the suburban came to a halt slamming into a tree suspended in the air by the roots of a tree beneath the suburban between the wheels.
upon me climbing back up to "ries road"
i found the foot of the being to describe this foot it was nothing i ever seen before. it had three toes with sharp talons black as nails i can describe more upon request. after me another person out the suburban made it to the top of the road his name was "todd west" todd went to eldorado high school in las vegas. i believe his first name was "theodore"  "todd" for short. as tood made it to the top of ries road he asked me what happened and i pointed at the foot and said we must have hit what ever this foot belonged to. just then we heard a noise on the cliff side of ries road. i went to look for what made the noise as it sounded like something moving in the grass area. we found a being laying on its stomach attempting to crawl away it heard me behind it and it flipped over on its back while crawling on its stomach it had a similarity of a crocodile the way the back looked and the tail and the mouth when it flipped over i saw it had 2 huge breast the size of  volley balls or bigger with a pattern on it that resembled the belly of a alligator or crocodile. it was female and had appendages that were similar to humans. when it realized i was there it crawled quickly toward the nearest tree and used the tree to support itself to stand on one leg with its back against the tree. this being looked at me and todd and began to cry with a voice that would sound like a child crying for help... i realized looking at this being standing on one leg balancing itself with the tree that it must be able to communicate some way. i instructed todd to do as i did and put down the sticks we were carrying as we were no match to fight this being even with it missing its left foot up to its calf. as we put down our weapons i communicated with it pointing at its foot and putting my back to the tree and asking it to sit down because it towered over us at 7-8 feet tall. three of my fingers wasnt equal to one if its fingers. it spoke had a loud voice. and as i asked it questions it asked me questions. this story gets deeper. because as we waited for help a teacher from camp left the camp to go home and found us on the road we all approached him the teacher and asked could he help by allowing us to put the being in his vehicle and we take it to the hospital. and he refused and said he would call someone when he got to the bottom of the mountain. well when night came coach "joe" had made it to the top of ries road with the remaining few  kids total of 5-6 kids and joe. and asked for us to walk back to camp and i told joe that i wanted to stay with it because i never seen anything die and i wanted to be there with her because we hit her and to leave the scene would be a hit and run. he insisted and we left as he promised to get help for her the being he hit.
the next day i was called into head coach "snider" office to meet with a man in a black suit with black hat and was told to tell him what happened as i told the story and got to the part of describing the being this person in black interrupted me and said "it was a deer" and i replied excuse me i was there and it was no deer and i began to describe it again and he rudely interrupted again and said, "yes it was a deer" mister  may i remind you that you are in custody and that we can keep you till your 26 so i replied it was a deer. mad because i was incarcerated to be rehabilitated and being forced to lie about the truth...
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Must talk with someone

content.detailedDescription: After opening my front door i looked up and saw a bright light flashing or pulsating can't be sure due to distance. i am sure it was out in space. however,it does night seem like a regular star nor sun light reflecting off of a satilite. it is stationary but due to rotation of the earth it appears to move. an airplane flew across the sky during the sighting of this object and even thought this object is further away it was brighter the the lights from the plane and also other stars appear far more dull and this object is by far closer to earth than any other stars i've seen. the sighting started at 10:55pm eastern ny time on the 25th of november 2011 and ended at 12:32am eastern ny time on the 26th of november because i'm going to sleep now. its change in color is less than a second and has various colors. i would like to have someone confirm that its a planet or star or whatever it maybe. on my iphone i used an app named digital compass for iphone, to get its location 150 degree se. latitude- 40.6900 n  longitude-  73.7986 w.
content.summary: Constant flashing light(s) of various colors in the se sky.

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 5:45 on 11/24/11, i was sitting out on my launi talking to my brother on the phone who lives in tennessee. we were dicussing thanksgiving dinner, family and such. i was leaned back in my chair facing an easterly direction when i saw 3 huge glowing orange obects in the sky coming towards my direction. the size was 10 times that of a passenger jets headlight. they were kind of hovering but also traveling really slow i sat forward in my chair and focused on the objects,my heart was racing, my mind was racing trying to figure out what they were. they weren't planes, or helicopters, or blimps. maybe three seconds went by and i began screaming into the phone that there were 3 ufo's right here! i immeadiatley told him i'd call him back and i hung up on him before he could reply. i ran to the pool deck a few feet away to get a better veiw. 
looking at them my heart started to beat faster then before. they were huge! like a big orb, they semed to be almost barrel shaped.They were glowing this bright orange pulsating color, with a lighter orange aura pulsating out. they were close and low in the sky. when i first saw them it seemed they were a hundred feet or so above tree level. there was one in the lead about maybe 3000 feet away from the other two and positioned in the middle airspace betwwen the two trailing objects. the two that were trailing were traveling maybe 500 feet apart one above the other. i strained my ears to see if i could hear any noise, but there was none. my heart felt like it was about to beat out of my chest, i was breathing hard. everything in my being was telling me that these objects were not from earth! then it hit me to get a witness. i ran about twenty feet opened the patio door to where my girlfriend was less than three feet away and yelled at her to come quick, come on you gotta see this! i know i scared her but she came right behind me to the pool deck and i was pointing to the sky the whole time screaming what is that, what is that? she didn't answer she just stood mesmerized by what she was looking at. we stood watching for another minute and they changed direction and were now heading south. i was yelling at "j" to take a picture, when i turned to look at her she was fooling with her new phone to get the camera up. she told me not to yell at her. i turned back to watch again and when the one in the lead got to a point in the sky that was between two stars it just dissapeared. i was yelling where did the first one go? where did it go? i looked back at "j" and she didn't say anything she was trying to watch the objects while  still fooling with her phone.  i got my phone out of my pocket and tried to get my camera up, (i heard "j"'s camera click on her phone)i looked back to the sky and the two objects were entering the same area between those two stars where the first one dissapeared, then at the same time they both dissapered as well. it wasn't like they shot out of veiw, they just dissapeared. i was screaming where did they go? where did they go? i heard "j" say "they just turned off their lights" "j" stood there about another 30 seconds and went back in the house without saying anything. i kept fixated on the sky for at least ten more minutes. then finally i realized they were gone. i went back into the house and asked "j" if she got a picture of them and she said no. i asked her what she thought, and she thought it was one big object, and the orange pulsating glow were afterburners. it took me hours to wind down. i am a military brat, prior military myself. lived in a military town my whole life (home of the blue angels) seen millions of planes take off and land from my backyard. seen the helicopters take off and land, even every once in a while a blimp even lands and takes off, what we saw on thanksgiving night was not anything from planet earth! it was an awesome experience! complete duration of entire sighting was approximately maybe 3 minutes. i will never forget it!!
content.summary: Saw 3 huge orange glowing objects in the sky at about 5:45 or 6pm on 11/24/11. the first object was in front maybe 3000 ft away from trailing 2 objects who were traveling one above the other.

content.detailedDescription: Cigar shaped very bright object   hovered or was stationary for about 20 minutes   im not sure how big it was   this not my first time  seeing this object    as bright as it was the lights lined the object making it seem cigar shaped   but i believe its a disc
content.summary: Cigar shaped very bright object    was stationary or hovering for 20 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
At first we thought it was a firework down naples bay.  it rose straight up but then instead of exploding, it began to move towards us.  then it veered westward over the golf of mexico.

soon #2 appeared - then #3.

#4 & #5 appeared within moments of each other & together took the same path.

we are still watching for more.
content.summary: Orange teardrop shape glowing & traveling in the sky.
